title: OneSoil
description:
Keep an eye on plant health, monitor field weather, and create notes right on your phone.


OneSoil Scouting is a free mobile app for farmers, crop consultants, and agronomists that assists with farming operations and lets you conduct farm monitoring via satellite.

Monitor crop growth


OneSoil Scouting calculates the vegetation index (NDVI) of a plant using satellite imagery.
